nodes.text: Laandon was a Human male doctor who worked for the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. Laandon was stationed in the Lower Industrial Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa, where he was killed when the Empire's warehouses there were raided by Republic operatives.
Doctor Laandon appears as a enemy on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
